targets.expr: sum(rate(fastly_origin_status_group_total{origin=~"$top_origin_id_4xx_per_request", status_group="4xx", origin=~"$origin", service_name=~"$service_name", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate])) by (service_name,service_id) / sum(rate(fastly_origin_responses_total{origin=~"$top_origin_id_4xx_per_request", origin=~"$origin", service_name=~"$service_name", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate])) by (service_name,service_id)

sum(rate(fastly_origin_status_group_total{origin=~"$top_origin_id_5xx_per_request", status_group="5xx", origin=~"$origin", service_name=~"$service_name", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate])) by (service_name,service_id) / sum(rate(fastly_origin_responses_total{origin=~"$top_origin_id_5xx_per_request", origin=~"$origin", service_name=~"$service_name", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate])) by (service_name,service_id)

list.definition: query_result(topk(10, max(rate(fastly_rt_errors_total{origin=~"$origin", service_name=~"$service_name", service_id=~"$service_id", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[${__range_s}s])) by (origin) / max(rate(fastly_origin_responses_total{origin=~"$origin", service_name=~"$service_name", service_id=~"$service_id", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[${__range_s}s])) by (origin)))
